mapper.select: select amount from shopping_cart_item where user_id=#{userId} and cellphone_id=#{cellphoneId}
mapper.update: update shopping_cart_item set amount=amount + #{amount} where user_id=#{userId} and cellphone_id=#{cellphoneId}
mapper.select: select sci.user_id user_id,sci.cellphone_id cellphone_id,sci.amount, c.c_id id,c.c_brand brand,c.c_model model, c.c_color color,c.c_price price from shopping_cart_item sci inner join cellphone c on cellphone_id=c_id
mapper.delete: delete from shopping_cart_item where user_id=#{userId} and cellphone_id=#{cellphoneId}
